name: CaveIsolation
description:
You were imprisoned in a russian gulag. In the midst of a intel war between the Soviet Union and the United States of America.

In the following aggressions between these two Superpowers a war could not be prevented.

The first nuclear Weapon landed in the Soviet Union itself. The gulag inwhich you were working as a miner got evecuated because of this and you are now left alone to starvation.

Play a little Prisoner whos trying to escape the deep caverns of an evecuated gulag. By using your given Pickaxe and the ability to move fallen rocks around.

Controls : use WASD to move

K to drop any Item that you are holding

L to Open the KeyDoors

Topright button is for restarting the given level

note:lmao i forgot to put an ending
